jjb.toolbox.form
Interface FormComponentIF

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
FormCheckbox, FormChoice, FormTextField, FormList, FormTextArea
public interface FormComponentIF
extends java.awt.event.FocusListener

Method Summary
 void ackStateChanged()
          ackStateChanged is called to acknowledge that information in the form component has changed, and returns it to the unflagged state.
 void clearData()
          clearData clears any user entered information from this form component.
 java.lang.Object getData()
          getData returns the information entered by the user in this form component.
 boolean hasStateChanged()
          hasStateChanged determines whether the user has modified the information in this form component.
 void init(java.lang.Object config)
          init initializes the form component's state, and sets any data with the specified config object.
 boolean isEnabled()
          isEnabled determines whether this form component's information can be modified.
 void setData(java.lang.Object data)
          setData sets information in this component with the specified data object using the form model.
 void setEnabled(boolean tf)
          setEnabled enables/disables this component, as determined by the tf parameter.
 void setStateChanged(boolean tf)
          setStateChanged forces a call to hasStateChanged to return either true of false depending upon the boolean parameter to this method.
 
Methods inherited from interface java.awt.event.FocusListener
focusGained, focusLost
 

Method Detail

ackStateChanged

public void ackStateChanged()
ackStateChanged is called to acknowledge that information in the form component has changed, and returns it to the unflagged state.
See Also:
hasStateChanged, setStateChanged

clearData

public void clearData()
clearData clears any user entered information from this form component.

getData

public java.lang.Object getData()
getData returns the information entered by the user in this form component.
Returns:
a Ljava.lang.Object representation the information contained in this form component.

hasStateChanged

public boolean hasStateChanged()
hasStateChanged determines whether the user has modified the information in this form component.
Returns:
a boolean value of true to indicate that the information in the form component has changed, false otherwise.
See Also:
acknowledgeStateChanged, setStateChanged

isEnabled

public boolean isEnabled()
isEnabled determines whether this form component's information can be modified.
Returns:
a boolean value of true to indicate enabled, and false to indicate disabled.

setData

public void setData(java.lang.Object data)
             throws java.util.zip.DataFormatException
setData sets information in this component with the specified data object using the form model.
Parameters:

setEnabled

public void setEnabled(boolean tf)
setEnabled enables/disables this component, as determined by the tf parameter.
Parameters:
tf - a boolean value indicating true to enable and false to disable this form component.

setStateChanged

public void setStateChanged(boolean tf)
setStateChanged forces a call to hasStateChanged to return either true of false depending upon the boolean parameter to this method.
Parameters:
tf - a boolean value setting the the state of the information in the form component to changed (true) or unchanged (false).
See Also:
hasStateChanged, acknowledgeStateChanged
